subject: Psychology and Psychologists
Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: When Kevin Ollie took over as Connecticut’s coach, he brought in a sports psychologist to foster chemistry for his team, which has paid off over the past two seasons.
snippet: When Kevin Ollie took over as Connecticut’s coach, he brought in a sports psychologist to foster chemistry for his team, which has paid off over the past two seasons.
